page.title: 11Mrs Smith A Villager
page.content: Mrs Smith has lived in Corringham for fifty years. She enjoys living there. When she first moved to Corringham there were not many buildings. She has moved house a couple of times and now lives in Middle Street. The only thing she does not like is motor bikes, she said that sometimes she is just trying to get to sleep and a motor bike goes past. The population of the village has grown a lot since she moved there. Corringham has changed but she thinks it has changed for the best because a lot of new houses have been built. There is not much vandalism in the village. Mrs Smith works at the village hall, but her life is very busy with looking after her mother who is an invalid. If she has any spare time she sometimes enjoys gardening.
